759330.name: Fantasy Grounds - Forest Map Pack by Joshua (Map Pack)
759330.description:
Forest Map Pack by Joshua

Forest Map Pack by Joshua Watmough brings a hand drawn unique map style to your Fantasy Grounds games. This pack includes 10 ready to use battle maps set to 100 by 100 pixel grid for optimal and ease of use. Simply drop in some encounters and you are ready to go!! The pack also includes non-grid versions allowing for customization of grid sizes and shapes.
This pack includes the following maps (one with a grid and one without for each map):
  • Barn
  • Forest Cottage
  • Forest Cottage with Roof
  • 4 Forest Maps
  • Forest Ruins
  • Goblin Warren Entrance
  • Great Stump
  • Wagon on Trail
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
